string.value:
ðŸ“š FACTUAL QUERY DETECTED

string.name: routing_explanation
string.value:
ðŸ§  CONCEPTUAL/PROCEDURAL QUERY

The system identified this as requiring semantic understanding or procedural knowledge.

Optimal strategy: Dense-heavy or balanced weights
Reason: These queries benefit from conceptual matching

ðŸ’¡ Notice how the system adapts automatically!
